response.overview: Today, many religions are becoming more dogmatic. They impose their rules and issue new commandments. At the same time, more and more believers, confronted with the evolution of society, aspire to decide for themselves and to choose their way of living God's message. So how to reconcile one's faith with one's respect for the commandments imposed by religion? "And Allah in all this?" proposes to meet practicing Muslims who, for the most part, try to reconcile the expression of their faith with the democratic practices of 21st century France. What is dogma, the precepts of the Koran, superstition or the legacy of tribal customs imported from the countries from which some of them come? How to live one's homosexuality and one's attachment to the Muslim faith?
response.title: Et Allah dans tout ça?
